articles.title: Stunning photo shows every planet in the solar system lining up across the night sky - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stargazers from around the world have shared  images of Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter and Saturn lining up in the night sky over the course of this week.
articles.content:
Stargazers have been capturing some spectacular images of a rare astronomical event that means every planet in the solar system is visible in the night sky at the same time.
